docs.lead_paragraph: EIGHTY seems to be universally regarded as a sort of almost impossible climacteric. In all countries and among all peoples it is an event, and as everybody is hoping to reach the same age, the days of the man of 80 are shortened by everybody anxiously asking, "How did you do it? Give us the combination."

headline.main: CHAUNCEY M. DEPEW TELLS HOW IT FEELS TO BE 80; The Days of the Man Who Has Reached That Age Are Shortened, He Says, by Everybody Anxiously Asking, "How Do You Do It?" -- Reminiscences of His Long Public Life.
